item.title: Rapist vaults over dock and flees court after guilty verdict - The Guardian
item.description:
Rapist vaults over dock and flees court after guilty verdict  The Guardian

A rapist is on the run after leaping out of a courtroom dock moments after being found guilty of a sexual attack on a 16-year-old girl. He forced his way out of the courtroom and into the main atrium before bursting through double doors and on to the street. item.description:

COPENHAGEN, Denmark (AP) — The man at the center of a sex abuse and financial crimes scandal that is tarnishing the academy awarding the Nobel Literature Prize was remanded in custody Monday, pending the verdict in his trial. item.title: White people make up largest proportion of British terror arrests - The Guardian
item.description:
White people make up largest proportion of British terror arrests  The Guardian

White people make up the largest proportion of arrested terrorism suspects for the first time in 13 years, official British figures show. There were 351 arrests for terrorism-related activity in the year to 30 June, a fall of 22% compared with the 449 arrests in the previous year, Home Office statistics show.
